StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIDeleteReferrals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- CHECK FOR A REFERRAL RECORD (i.e., WAS THIS CONTRACT REFERRED BY SOMEONE ELSE?) --- AND CHECK FOR REFERRER RECORDS (i.e., DID THIS CONTRACT REFER SOMEONE ELSE?) IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM REFERRAL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM REFERRAL WHERE DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) BEGIN --- BEGIN TRANSACTION
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN BEFORE WE DELETE THE REFERRAL RECORD UPDATE REFERRAL SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID OR DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
--- DELETE ANY REFERRAL RECORDS DELETE FROM REFERRAL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID OR DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN --- ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred deleing the referral record for CONTRACT ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @ContractID) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- COMMIT TRANSACTION END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
